articles.description: In this week's View From the Kop, Liverpool fan Hasib Afzal gives us his views on Jurgen Klopp, Thiago Alcantara, the Anfield unbeaten run and much more
articles.content:
Liverpool strolled past Leicester on Sunday evening. How impressive was that performance given the Reds' injuries and the good form Leicester have been in?
Undoubtedly, our best performance of the s… [+4698 chars]
